data.title: Michael Simpson, MD
data.meta_description: Michael Simpson, MD is an urgent care specialist practicing urgent care, internal medicine, pediatrics and internal medicine/pediatrics in Smyrna, Kennesaw and Marietta. He has been with Wellstar since 2008.
data.text:
5

The Care I received from beginning to end was absolutely amazing. So grateful for such a caring staff of medical professionals! Thank you

5

We love Dr. Simpson!

5

Dr. Simpson and the staff were extremely professional, prompt, and took care of my needs. Great great office site. Will recommend family and friends. Thank you.

5

I did not have to wait long at all, which was great. The test results came back quickly. The doctor and staff were very helpful and correctly diagnosed my problem. I'm very thankful for the doctor, his diagnosis and his insistence that I go to the hospital to fix my issue.

5

the staff was so so, but the doctor was very good and informative about my issues

5

Dr. Simpson was a very good doctor. He explains always explain very good customer service, man, manners, I will recommend Dr. Simpson and Dr. Patel to my family 100%

5

This office and its staff have been amazing. I always feel confident that my family is in good hands when a health scare arises by coming here

5

My experience was off the chain. Everyone was polite, professional and caring.

5

Quick and focused on my problem. Felt better when I left

5

It was good !!

5

All interactions were professional and pleasant. I felt seen and heard and received the health services I needed -both being very important to me. The only downside is there is only one doctor at this facility which put them at somewhat of a disadvantage.

5

I love this office when my primary doctor can't see me. Everyone is great and helpful.

5

They were very professional, everything they did was explained, courteous.

4

Dr. Simpson listened very well to my concerns. He also informed me when I should start feeling better after taking medication. The medical assistant asked all the questions that was needed to figure out what testing I need to have done. Overall everyone was great.

5

Every one so nice people,great attention thanks ,I have Urgen care in my little City but I prefer to come here

5

The staff was extremely helpful and understanding, my nurse went above and beyond the call of duty, she was incredibly professional courteous and extremely nice. I'm sorry I can't remember her name. Dr. Simpson Was also professional courteous and nice.

5

I appreciate the front desk persons patience while I dealt with some insurance frustration. Overall everything was pleasant

5

RN Shenand and Dr. Simpson were both caring, personable, good listeners and gave good explanations. Very good experience!

4

Always receive great service at this location. In most cases, there's no wait time. love it!

5

Dr.Simpson was great and so were the staff. Made my husband fall terrible fall much better. The doctor and the staff made sure I knew what was going on the whole time. Thank you Well Star urgent care you made a bad day better.

5

Facility was clean and bright. Staff courteous and professional. The doctor was prompt, attentive, asked questions, discussed options and projected confidence,explaining eveything at the appropriate level. I felt very comfortable and peaceful while there. Very good experience over other urgent cares i have used in the past.

5

I am very impressed with WELLSTAR!

5

I was well pleased with how they was concern

5

Very easy to make an appointment online. Got in promptly and received care promptly. My prescription was ordered and ready at the pharmacy before I even left the office.

5

Staf very courteous and professional

5

Dr. Simpson is great,!

5

Everyone was very friendly. They greeted me. They helped me to, you know, get back in a timely manner, explained everything to me as well. We were able to call in my prescription to the pharmacy, and I felt taken care of from the front office to the, you know, in the exam room and with the doctor as well. So, overall, it was a 10 experience and excellent customer service. Excellent. Thanks.

4

I really like this facility! Dr Simpson was spot on and very concerned

3

I would expect to be getting better after the Second day of meditations.

5

I thought the staff was very professional, very friendly, and very knowledgeable. I enjoyed my visit.
